channel.title: Scientific Writing | JooYoung Seo: Learning Scientist; Data Scientist; Accessibility Engineer

item.title: LaTeX is NOT Easy: Creating Accessible Scientific Documents With R Markdown

Click the Cite button above to import publication metadata into your reference management software.

This work has been presented in the 34th CSUN Assistive Technology Conference in Anaheim, CA, U.S (Wednesday, March 13, 2019 - 1:20 PM PST).
